<math alttext="2 P O C l 3 gas is in equilibrium with 2 P C l 3 gas plus O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>POCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>⇄</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>PCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></math> <math alttext="delta G naught of reaction equals positive 490 kilojoules per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>490</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
A sample of <math alttext="P O C l 3 gas " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>POCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is placed in a closed, rigid container at <math alttext="298 kelvins" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>298</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>K</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and allowed to reach equilibrium according to the equation above. Based on the value for <math alttext="delta G naught of reaction equals positive 490 kilojoules per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>G</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>490</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, which of the following is true?

choices.label: <math alttext="K equals e to the power of the negative of the fraction 490000 over 8.314 times 298, end fraction, is significantly less than 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.10em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mn>490</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8.314</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mn>298</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mo><</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and at equilibrium <math alttext="P sub P O C l 3 is significantly greater than P sub P C l 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>POCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>PCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="K equals e to the power of the fraction 8.314 times 298 over 490000, end fraction, is greater than 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.314</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>298</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>490</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.10em"></mspace></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and at equilibrium <math alttext="P sub O 2 is greater than P sub P O C l 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>POCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="K equals e to the power of the negative of the fraction 490 over 8.314 times 298, end fraction, is less than 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.10em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mn>490</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8.314</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mn>298</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and at equilibrium <math alttext="P sub P O C l 3 is less than P sub P C l 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>POCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>PCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="K equals e to the power of the fraction 8.314 times 298 over 490, end fraction, is significantly greater than 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.10em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.314</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mn>298</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>490</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and at equilibrium <math alttext="P sub O 2 is significantly greater than P sub P O C l 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>POCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="K equals e to the power of the negative of the fraction 490000 over 8.314 times 298, end fraction, is significantly less than 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.10em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mn>490</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8.314</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mn>298</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mo><</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and at equilibrium <math alttext="P sub P O C l 3 is significantly greater than P sub P C l 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>POCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>PCl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.
